name: subscribo/apiclientoauth
description: Package to connect to 3rd party Oauth services for API Client

suggest.laravel/framework: This package have been developed to work with The Laravel Framework 5.0
suggest.illuminate/foundation: (already contained in laravel/framework) - If using OAuthLoginTrait, OAuthController or ApiClientOAuthServiceProvider (recommended version ~5.0)
suggest.illuminate/session: (already contained in laravel/framework) - If using OAuthLoginTrait, OAuthController or ApiClientOAuthServiceProvider (recommended version ~5.0)
suggest.illuminate/routing: (already contained in laravel/framework) - If using OAuthLoginTrait, OAuthController or ApiClientOAuthServiceProvider (recommended version ~5.0)
suggest.illuminate/http: (already contained in laravel/framework) - If using OAuthLoginTrait, OAuthController or ApiClientOAuthServiceProvider (recommended version ~5.0)
suggest.illuminate/support: (already contained in laravel/framework) - If using ApiClientOAuthServiceProvider (recommended version ~5.0)
suggest.subscribo/apiclientauth: If using OAuthLoginTrait, OAuthController or ApiClientOAuthServiceProvider (recommended version: @dev)
suggest.subscribo/exception: If using OAuthLoginTrait, OAuthController or ApiClientOAuthServiceProvider (recommended version: @dev)
suggest.subscribo/restcommon: If using OAuthLoginTrait, OAuthController or ApiClientOAuthServiceProvider (recommended version: @dev)
